column3: Hmm, given the deprecation of rpcuser/rpcpassword in favor of the cookie auth, maybe we should simply remove rpcuser instead?
@TheBlueMatt `rpcuser.py` is for rpcauth, not rpcuser/rpcpassword. It should probably be renamed.
utACK. \n(assuming you have tested compatibility of this code with python 3)

Thanks @laanwj. I've updated the PR description to show compatibility with both major Python versions.\n\n@achow101 @TheBlueMatt: I'd be happy to rename `rpcuser.py` to `rpcauth.py`, or similar, in a follow-up PR.

> I've updated the PR description to show compatibility with both major Python versions.

Thanks, clear.

> I'd be happy to rename rpcuser.py to rpcauth.py, or similar, in a follow-up PR.

Yes, let's leave that for a future PR, and not diffuse the scope of this trivial change.
I sent #11836 as the follow-up to rename the script to `rpcauth.py`.
